actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to utilize the property at Phoenixville, Pa., previously used as the Valley Forge General Hospital, for the establishment of a national cemetery.

summary.text: Provides for the utilization of the property at Phoenixville, Pennsylvania, previously used as the Valley Forge General Hospital, for the establishment of a national cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to utilize the property at Phoenixville, Pa., previously used as the Valley Forge General Hospital, for the establishment of a national cemetery.
